description: Scammer impersonates courier company claiming parcel is held at customs and requires payment of duty/charges to release it.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your international parcel AWB#DHL987654321 is held at Mumbai customs. Pay customs duty Rs.2,450 to release shipment. Parcel contains: Apple iPhone 15. Reply URGENT.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: namaste sir... i am very worried i did not order any iphone 15... maybe my son sent it from bangalore? i dont want police trouble... how do i pay the 2450 rs? pls tell me process i am not good with phone

turns.scammer_message: Hello sir/mam I am Ramesh Kumar from DHL Express India. Your parcel from USA is waiting clearance. You must pay customs duty today otherwise parcel will return to sender after 48 hours.

other_critical_info.label: Scammer Persona
other_critical_info.value: Ramesh Kumar from DHL Express India

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: hello mr ramesh... i am confused why usa? my son works in bangalore only... but i dont want it to go back... i want to pay the duty fee... how can i send the 2450 rupees? do i use paytm or bank? pls help me sir

turns.scammer_message: Payment is simple sir. Pay Rs.2450 customs duty to our collection UPI ID: dhl.customs.india@oksbi. Or you can pay to our customs clearance number 7890123456 via PhonePe/GooglePay.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok sir i am opening my google pay now... hands are shaking a little bit i am so nervous... i typed the upi id dhl.customs.india@oksbi... but i want to be sure before i press pay button... what name will show up on screen? i dont want to send to wrong person by mistake... pls tell me the name so i can match it

turns.scammer_message: After payment, your tracking will update and parcel delivered within 24 hours. Also visit our portal http://dhl-customs-clearance.co for online payment option. Fast mam, sender is waiting!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: sir waht is that link for? i am scared to click blue letters... i am already on the google pay screen with the upi... pls just tell me the name that should show up so i can pay the 2450 rs quickly... i dont want to send to wrong person beta... is it dhl or ramesh? i want to verify before pressing pay

turns.scammer_message: Mam/Sir last day today! If payment not received, parcel goes to auction. You will lose iPhone 15 worth Rs.80,000! Pay Rs.2450 now to dhl.customs.india@oksbi or call 7890123456. Do it fast!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh god sir pls dont auction it... i am crying now i dont want to lose 80000 phone... i am trying to pay the 2450 rs right now... i typed the upi id dhl.customs.india@oksbi in my google pay... but i am scared to press button without checking name... does it show dhl or your name ramesh? pls tell me correct name so i can send money fast... i am waiting sir
